channel.title: Mutiple Questions
channel.description: 1. How do i make npc's talk. 2. How do i change the name and where u go when u click a tele in the mage book it. 3. How to fix trade screen dupe and other ones. If i have any more ill post(im using delta source if that helps)

item.title: Mutiple Questions
item.dc:creator: @Goran Goran
item.description:
@Goran wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:3, topic:266127”][quote author=Goran link=topic=351384.msg2697949#msg2697949 date=1236396209]

  1. How do i make npc’s talk.

  2. How do i change the name and where u go when u click a tele in the mage book it.

  3. How to fix trade screen dupe and other ones.
    If i have any more ill post(im using delta source if that helps)
    [/quote]

  4. Answered in your other thread

  5. TextHandler class, and for the teleports…

Delta - clickingMost class
Other - client class

  1. Try the search bar, it depends on the way they are duping.[/quote]
    have treid search bar and can u go in more depth about tele

Read full topic
